list.comment_settings.comment_enabled.de: Enable comments for this post by default. Readers can leave comments at the bottom of the post.
list.comment_settings.comment_strategy.h: Public: Anyone can leave comments, and the comments will be shown immediately.
Approval Only: Anyone can leave comments, but the comments will be hidden until you approve them.
Subscriber Only: Only subscribers can leave comments, and the comments will be shown immediately.
Premium Subscriber Only: Only premium subscribers can leave comments, and the comments will be shown immediately.
onboarding.list.subtitle: Unique and attractive channel information will help you grow your audience. Please fill in all the fields to create a new channel.
list.danger_settings.delete_list.desc: Once you delete a channel, there is no going back. Please be certain.
To confirm, type "{list}" in the box below.
This will permanently delete all posts, bower updates, and other content of {list}. All subscribers and cooperators of {list} will be removed.
I understand all subscribers will be deleted
I understand all posts will be deleted
I understand all other things related with this channel will be deleted
CAUTION: YOU CAN NOT UNDO THIS ACTION! It will take about 48 hours to complete the deletion, during which you cannot create a new channel.
